name: Marbl
description:
Roll the ball to the goal as fast as possible, with new maps added daily until I run out of ideas, motivation or storage space!

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

  • Left Stick - move
  • Right Stick - camera
  • B (Using Xbox button convention) - reset
  • Start/Select - exit race

KEYBOARD + MOUSE CONTROLS:

  • WASD - move
  • Arrow keys/Mouse - camera
  • Shift - reset
  • Q/Escape - exit race

LIKELY COMPLAINTS

"This runs terribly on my laptop!" - you should probably disable shadows

"My marble did a glitchy bounce!" - I've tweaked the physics to try and prevent this, any more would require me to write a custom physics engine and nobody has time for that

"The camera slowly pans when using the mouse!" - known issue, using fullscreen (or disabling the mouse controls in options) seems to fix it

"My low integrity friend is sending sus times to me!" - ask them to send a screenshot, that's harder to fake

"WHERE'S THE E" - unfortunately, "marble" is a real word, and we can't possibly have that
